DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Risk Factors Cohort Latina Women
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : Cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) lead cause death among Latina woman ( LW ) United States . Nursing knowledge area CVD Latina woman currently underdevelop . Most study include Mexican woman limit information predictor resource , situational , personal , demographic factor effect CVD-related dietary practice , physical activity , exercise practice among Latina woman subgroups Central American woman . DESIGN NARRATIVE : To conduct cross-sectional follow-up preliminary intervention study order describe analyze CVD-related diet , physical activity , exercise practice predictor 221 Mexican Central American woman recruit six county Northern California . Face-to-face interview conduct Mexican American Central American woman ( age 40-75 ) least one risk factor CVD answer follow question : What CVD-related risk factor , dietary practice , physical activity , exercise behavior Mexican Central American woman 40 75 year least one risk factor CVD ? What relationship predictor variable ( resource , situational , personal , demographic factor ) CVD-related diet practice , physical activity , exercise behavior ( outcome variable ) ? , short intermediate-term effect cardiovascular nursing intervention diet , physical activity , exercise ? A sample 221 woman target . Data collect first two year project provide substantial research-based information develop cardiovascular nursing intervention support Latina woman effort promote heart health prevent CVD . Data analyze third year cardiovascular nursing intervention develop determine short ( 3 month ) intermediate-term ( 6 month ) effect outcome variable . A randomly select sample 60 woman cohort randomly assign develop intervention group ( n=30 group ) delayed-intervention control group . The study completion date list record obtain `` End Date '' enter Protocol Registration Results System ( PRS ) record .
